page.title: 07MY FAMILY
page.content: There are four people in my family. My dad is a police man and my mum is a secretary. My brother goes to the secondary school and I am in the third year of junior school. We live in a large three bedroomed detached house.We have a kitchen, two living rooms and a back garden. We have three T.V.s and a computer. My grandparents were in the war. My uncle is tall and he has a wife and a baby girl. They live about an hour away. My mum and dad have a car each. We go abroad every two years we go to places like Corfu and Spain. The other years we stay in England. In my free time I like playing on a computer. Sometimes I go fishing with my dad or brother, I like that a lot. I also enjoy swimming and riding my BMX. My family is very nice. Neil Taylor
